1.0.name: wordpress/lexity-live-for-wp-e-commerce
1.0.description:
The Lexity Live for WP e-Commerce plugin for WordPress provides the following functionality:

  • See who is in your store now, and what products they are picking up and putting in their shopping cart.
  • Get graphs of revenue and traffic over the past 12 months.
  • See real time revenue and traffic from Google, Amazon, Facebook, Pinterest, Twitter, and more.
  • Get actionable recommendations for your marketing.
  • Get detailed statistics to help you better understand your business, including keywords, referral links, search engines, geolocation, and time on site.
  • Chat with visitors who are in your shopping cart or are looking at specific product pages (first five chats per day ar
